segments.text: Observing this line drawing, the composition is angled nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink area on the right draws my eye first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's there, absorbed in her dish-drying task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unaware that water's overflowing from the full sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's streaming down the cabinet fronts to the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children on the left are into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's precariously perched on the wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach is bold, holding a plate too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's attentive, arm up in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their teamwork is sweet, if sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the risks—the wet floor, tipping stool—make me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No one's noticing; it's all about to collide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tidy garden outside highlights the inner disorder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang for what might happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR
